Articles.Content:
I'm trying to create a large landing gear and am running into the death wobble where a heavy craft or even normal landing force will bend and wobble the gears. Is this a physics scaling issue? Is there anyway to increase the angular resisting force on the attach joints?

Edited April 21, 2014 by keptin

Bump.

Having the same issue, almost like a positive feedback loop where it gets worse over time. Increasing the joint strength doesn't seem to help.

Would adding suspension to the legs fix this issue?
Use Part Angle Display in conjunction with Firespitter's gear alignment module to ensure the gear are actually aligned with the axis of travel (and straight up, too). See if the problem persists.
